title: Internship Interview

I was then asked a little bit about myself and the reason why I chose Public Health. The internship was explained a little bit to me, and I was told I would receive the new hire intern paperwork to complete.

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation (Green Valley Lake, CA)

title: Marketing Team Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation

title: Public Health Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation (Dallas-Fort Worth) in Apr 2023

title: Public Health Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation (Rancho Cucamonga, CA) in Mar 2023

Straight to the point and felt more like a warm, welcoming conversation. Cynthia is incredibly supportive and genuinely cares about the applicants, taking the time to thoroughly read my application and answer all my questions. The majority of the time was spent on reviewing the organization's mission, values, and goals. A great experience through and through.

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation (Denver, CO) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions:
In connecting with Cynthia over our interview, it was a privilege to have a glimpse into Assuaged’s ongoing evolution and the nature of their internship program. 
She has built an empowering organization from the ground up, supported by a vision of advocating for sustainable lifestyle changes and health-conscious living, empowering voices in marginalized communities, and the overall transformation of public health systems. Through the expansion of technology and media as channels of communication with the collective audience, Assuaged holds space for individuals to connect with themselves and others—leading them to a place where they can discover those who align with the lifestyle they are striving for in the world of health. 

Cynthia truly carries the message of envisioning a healthier, happier individual. She held space for me to freely express myself in a personal and professional manner, within an inquisitive and supportive environment. What initially pulled me in to apply for this program was their emphasis on community-based collaborative efforts to manifest a unified vision. In talking with Cynthia, I gained a deeper understanding of Assuaged’s alluring brand and their distinctly powerful message that immensely affects peoples lives in positive ways. Aside from the incredible array of benefits and valuable resources offered within this internship, I endeavored to apply for this internship due to the opportunities within this program to make valuable connections and potentially experience growth in exciting, yet challenging territories.

In sharing informational resources and offering avenues of connection, Assuaged leads the individual to a more health-conscious way of living, while encouraging connection with communities comprised of individuals facing chronic disease or a common struggle. Cynthia embodies the fearless commitment to personal health, as she demonstrates the exquisite growth and rewarding change it can lead to. Her compassionate personality intensely reflects Assuaged’s inspirational mission and their striving ideals.

I believe it would be the mission of a lifetime to dedicate one’s energy to creating sustainable lifestyle changes across the individual and collective level. I am grateful for Cynthia’s time and willingness to connect. It would be a privilege to partake in an organization ultimately founded upon a meaningful vision that makes it possible to build balanced, optimistic communities.
Interview Questions: Cynthia asked me to expand upon why I view Assuaged as an ideal work place to learn and connect.

title: Data Analyst Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation (Chicago, IL)
Interview Descriptions: After I applied for the internship program there was an email from Assuaged to schedule an interview date and time. Based upon my flexibility and their availability I selected the time slot. In the day there was a call from Assuaged.  The interview was for half an hour and was a very friendly interview.

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: When it comes to initiating the actual interview, there were some technical difficulties but through the will of not giving up, I managed to speak with Mrs. Cynthia about her company and what they stand for and how they are able to help me and vice versa.
Interview Questions: If a situation was deemed impossible, would you consider it impossible?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: Submitted an application on the website and received an email to set up an interview. Was a quick and easy process, interview took about 30 mins and was really impressed with the opportunities and resources that they offer.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little about yourself, your experiences. Why did you choose this company?

title: MBA/MPH Rotational Program Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation (Indianapolis, IN) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: Following an online application a 1:1 interview reveiwed the Assuaged wellness platform and my skills which coul be utilized to enhance the company.  Ater a brief overview, the owner had several questions and reciprocated for me to ask for any clarification about the intern rotation for my MPH program.  We looked at several software examples together which the platform utilizes.
Interview Questions: How did I find out about Assuaged?

title: Business Administration Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: For this interview I applied online. The application form asked questions about our interests and passions towards healthy living. Within two day’s I heard back from the company and had an interview.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little about yourself. What interested you about the company?

title: Public Health Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation (Los Angeles, CA) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was informal and enjoyable. Cynthia is personable easy to talk to. She was interested in my story and eager to share hers. She was excited that we share the same interests and passions.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to intern for Assuaged?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Assuaged Foundation in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by one of the owners of the company, Cynthia Murphy. She was super sweet and kind! She listened to my qualifications and explained to me what the internship would entail. After our conservation, she told me she'd be happy to have me on. Overall, an easy and great experience!
Interview Questions: Why did you choose this company to apply for an internship?
